description: Topics in Contemporary American Literature, an example of which has been "The Literary History of The Cold War, 1947-1957". Other very recent topics and authors may be themes of this course.
name: TOPICS CONTEMP AMER LIT: Writers House Fellows Seminar: W. Bernstein, L. Anderson, S. Sontag
